english.segment1: see you walking by my side. wondering if you miss me at all. take the furthest step to reach your dreams. take the furthest step and give your all. don't lose hope on a dark night. say goodnight. miles hold you back from me. and will we ever be again?. in the moon light i loved you. in the moonlight say goodbye. see the sun rise up and you run into my arms. lift the son up high and hes never gonna leave you. he will never let go...
